name: Carly saves the Devster-verse
description:
This is a game I made for the Brackeys game jam... unfinished, but is a solid prototype so check it out.

tap "SHIFT" to spin, the spin move can defend you and also makes you go faster in the air.

Tap "W" at any time to go back to the title screen if anything happens.

Tap "ENTER" in the title screen to get to the first level.

Thanks for playing!
